sentences.en: A heedless, reckless creature he was.
sentences.cn: 他是个粗心大意 、 无法无天的家伙.

sentences.en: Don't stumble, you heedless little thing.
sentences.cn: 别绊倒, 你这个粗心的小东西.

sentences.en: He was involved in a lawsuit because of his heedless remarks.
sentences.cn: 他因冒失的言论而卷入一场官司.

sentences.en: Heedless of everyone's jesting remarks, Fang put down his glass and followed her.
sentences.cn: 方鸿渐顾不得人家说笑话, 放下杯子跟出去.

sentences.en: Heedless of our advice, he went a swim and drowned.
sentences.cn: 他不“听从”我们的劝告, 出去游泳给淹死了.

sentences.en: Heedless of our advice, he went for a swim and drowned.
sentences.cn: 他不听从我们的劝告, 出去游泳给淹死了.

sentences.en: Natalie, I have certainly been heedless about a serious matter.
sentences.cn: 娜塔丽, 我以前对这个严重问题的确太疏忽了.

sentences.en: O’Hara rode on, heedless of danger.
sentences.cn: 奥哈拉不理会危险，继续骑马前行。

sentences.en: Presently this thought occurred to me; how heedless I have been!
sentences.cn: 不多一时, 我心里就想:我也太心粗气浮了!

sentences.en: She stood glued to the radio, heedless of the ordered bustle about her.
sentences.cn: 她站在那里一动不动地听收音机, 毫不注意周围有秩序的忙碌.

sentences.en: She thought of the wood, and stole toward it, heedless of long grass and briers.
sentences.cn: 她想到了那个树林, 于是就偷偷向那儿溜去, 不管有多少深草和荆棘.

sentences.en: She was rum-maging through the letters, scattering them about the table in her heedless haste.
sentences.cn: 她在信件里乱翻，匆忙冒失之下将它们扔得满桌都是。

sentences.en: The boy stepped into puddles with heedless haste.
sentences.cn: 那男孩匆匆忙忙,结果冒冒失失地踏进水坑.

sentences.en: They are as heedless and as indolent as cats.
sentences.cn: 他们都和猫儿一样,懒惰驯良.

sentences.en: Wanting caution or discretion ; heedless of consequences; rash; reckless.
sentences.cn: 不谨慎的; 轻率的;不思后果的; 卤莽的;不顾一切的.

words.tran_cn: 注意的；深切注意的；深切留心的
掉以轻心地；不加注意地
